channel.title: Artificial Intelligence on Kiils
channel.description: Recent content in Artificial Intelligence on Kiils

item.title: Humans should also be prompted properly
item.description: The other day I posted a few lines on Facebook. My intention was to point out what can be called perspective - that a case can be seen from several angles. Specifically, it was about “Store Bededag” and the many other more or less official holidays that spring offers in Denmark. And there are a lot of them. My point was that for a self-employed person who works from home, these could well be perceived as interruptions.

item.title: How ChatGPT made my son laugh - and why it is important
item.description: Recently I installed Marvin . Now, Marvin also happens to be the name of a dog dear to our family. So my kids kind of feel strongly about the name, and were both a bit offended about an Artificial Intelligence with the same name. But in this case Marvin is a batteries-included library for building AI-powered software. Marvin’s job is to integrate AI directly into your codebase by making it look and feel like any other function.
